text: Trevor James Morgan (born 30 September 1956) is a British professional athlete and coach. He is best known as an Association football or soccer player.Soccerway.com, T. Morgan; retrieved 2012-7-12. Since 2010, he has been the coach at East Bengal F.C.. ==References== ==Other websites== * Soccerbase.com, Trevor Morgan * Newcastlefans.com, Trevor Morgan Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:AFC Bournemouth players Category:Australian soccer managers Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Bristol Rovers F.C. players Category:English football managers Category:Footballers from London Category:People from the London Borough of Newham
title: Trevor Morgan (footballer)
